description: Weekly Numbas lessons covering Algebra, Calculus, and Maple via Moodle with instant feedback. Best 6 out of 9 weeks count towards grade. Includes hand calculations and technology-aided problems.
Two supervised in-person tests (40 minutes each) with mixed hand-solved and Maple questions. Lab Test 1 (Week 4) and Lab Test 2 (Week 9) each contribute 15%. Unlimited practice attempts provided.
Typed mathematical communication task using Word/LaTeX with focus on clarity and correctness. Individualized questions released in Week 5, due Week 7. Graded on explanation quality and presentation.

2-hour supervised Numbas exam during exam period covering all course content (50 multiple-choice questions). Includes Maple-related questions. Conducted in computer labs with pre-exam practice materials.
